wikipedia_page.main: Harry Cleaver (born 1880) was an English footballer who played as a forward. Born in Macclesfield, he played for Desborough Town and Manchester United.

response: Harry Cleaver Jr. (21 January 1944) is an American scholar, Marxist theoretician,  and professor emeritus at the University of Texas at Austin. He is best known as the author of Reading Capital Politically, an autonomist reading of Karl Marx's Capital. Cleaver is currently active in the Zapatista movement in Chiapas, Mexico.
*Harry Cleaver Study Guide to Marx's Capital Volume 1
